transformed_characters.name: Surya
transformed_characters.motivation: Solve the unsolvable data anomaly, prove analytical superiority
transformed_characters.arc: Meets his intellectual match, learns humility

cyberpunk_details.signature_tool: Custom AR overlay for data visualization
cyberpunk_details.quirk: Doesn't use standard interfaces, prefers raw data streams

transformed_characters.transformation_notes: Consulting detective -> Data consultant. Same pattern recognition, same detachment, same need for puzzles.

transformed_characters.name: Gopi
transformed_characters.motivation: Document Surya's genius, maintain friendship, provide human perspective
transformed_characters.arc: Serves as bridge between genius and humanity

cyberpunk_details.narrative_style: Technical but accessible, explains the human side

transformed_characters.transformation_notes: Army doctor -> Systems engineer. Still the grounded narrator, still the bridge to humanity.

transformed_characters.name: Venkat
transformed_characters.motivation: Protect self from corporate retaliation, outsmart the system
transformed_characters.arc: Proves technical expertise equals Surya's, escapes on own terms

cyberpunk_details.skills: Social engineering, system penetration, identity management
cyberpunk_details.signature: Leaves no digital trace, impossible to track

transformed_characters.transformation_notes: Opera singer -> Security researcher. Both use performance and deception, both are underestimated.

transformed_characters.name: Bhuvan
transformed_characters.arc: Learns he can't control everything with authority

cyberpunk_details.situation: Has sensitive neural memory recording with Venkat
cyberpunk_details.stakes: Upcoming promotion to Director, can't afford scandal
cyberpunk_details.company: NexusCorp - one of the big five megacorporations
cyberpunk_details.authority_level: High, but not executive - can be fired

transformed_characters.transformation_notes: King -> Senior Employee. MORE vulnerable, MORE relatable, same pride and desperation.

transformed_characters.name: Mahesh

cyberpunk_details.approach: Relies on standard surveillance and security protocols

transformed_characters.transformation_notes: Scotland Yard -> Corp Security AI. Same by-the-book approach, same algorithmic thinking.

transformed_plot.title: The Desperate Employee
transformed_plot.original_event: King of Bohemia visits Sherlock with impossible problem
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_event: Bhuvan arrives at Surya's server farm via encrypted holo-call, desperate
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_stakes: Bhuvan's career and promotion - In 2089, losing your job means losing your housing, healthcare, and identity

setting_details.atmosphere: Neon-lit, humming servers, raw data streams

transformed_plot.title: Digital Investigation
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_event: Surya infiltrates Venkat's digital footprint across networks
transformed_plot.stakes: Finding the location of the neural memory file
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_stakes: Finding the location of the neural memory file

setting_details.method: Tracing data packets, analyzing access logs
setting_details.surprise: Venkat has been watching Surya too

transformed_plot.title: The Deception
transformed_plot.original_event: Holmes disguises himself and tricks Irene
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_event: Surya creates fake security breach to flush Venkat out
transformed_plot.stakes: Location of the neural memory file
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_stakes: Location of the neural memory file

setting_details.plan: Venkat will move the file to secure location - Surya intercepts

transformed_plot.title: Outsmarted
transformed_plot.original_event: Irene outsmarts Holmes, escapes with photo
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_event: Venkat anticipates the trap, moves file to unreachable quantum-encrypted storage

setting_details.revelation: Venkat saw through the spoof instantly
setting_details.message: Leaves encrypted note: 'You disappoint me, Consultant'
setting_details.escape: Goes completely dark, impossible to trace

transformed_plot.title: Respect
transformed_plot.original_event: Holmes keeps Irene's photo as trophy of respect
transformed_plot.cyberpunk_event: Surya keeps Venkat's note as screensaver - only case he couldn't solve

setting_details.bhuvan_outcome: Forced to come clean, loses promotion but keeps job
setting_details.surya_change: Admits to Gopi: 'He was better than me'
setting_details.final_image: Venkat's message glowing on Surya's main display

preserved_themes.cyberpunk_relevance: In a world of AI and algorithms, human genius is both essential and humbled
Code doesn't care about your corporate title - the best hacker wins
manifestations: Employee Bhuvan at mercy of researcher Venkat

preserved_themes.theme: Surveillance and deception in digital age
preserved_themes.cyberpunk_relevance: Digital disguises are harder to detect and easier to create

world_building.corporate_structure: Five megacorps control everything, strict hierarchy

social_rules.employee_life: Corporate housing, tracked performance, precarious status
social_rules.data_privacy: None for employees, absolute for executives

transformation_log.decision: Created name mapping with user's specifications
transformation_log.reasoning: Using Gopi as narrator, Venkat as foil keeps the personal connection
Role: protagonist. Kept core traits: obsessively observant, intellectually arrogant...
Role: narrator. Kept core traits: loyal, grounded...
Role: foil/antagonist. Kept core traits: intellectually brilliant, morally ambiguous...
Role: client. Kept core traits: desperate, proud...
Role: authority. Kept core traits: by-the-book, competent within limits...
Preserved emotional tone: urgent, mysterious, desperate. Stakes: Bhuvan's career and promotion
Preserved emotional tone: curious, analytical, methodical. Stakes: Finding the location of the neural memory file
Preserved emotional tone: tense, clever, game of wits. Stakes: Location of the neural memory file
Preserved emotional tone: surprise, admiration, defeat. Stakes: Surya's ego, Bhuvan's future
Preserved emotional tone: bittersweet, respectful, humbled. Stakes: Surya's growth as a person
